fullName: STACY D. LIND, D.M.D., M.A., M.P.H., M.B.A., M.A.G.D.
quote: I would rather be measured by how I treat others—especially those outside my own frame of reference—than by a list of credentials printed on a piece of paper.
bio: Dr. Stacy Doyle Lind, DMD—affectionately known as 'Stace'—is a respected clinician, educator, and innovator with over 30 years of experience in dentistry, healthcare leadership, and academic scholarship. He built a multimillion-dollar dental practice in Centennial, Colorado, featuring an in-house implant milling lab and clinical training center. After selling his practice to Heartland Dental, he became the lead doctor and mentor for Professional Dental, overseeing the development and clinical quality of 22 practices. Dr. Lind's academic background is expansive and interdisciplinary. In addition to his dental credentials and advanced training in implantology, prosthodontics, sedation, and esthetics, he holds a Master of Business Administration (MBA) in Healthcare Administration, a Master’s in Public Health (MPH), and a Master's degree in Biblical Studies. He is also currently completing a Ph.D. in Psychology, with a focus on human behavior, cognition, and cultural context. He earned certification in Biblical Hebrew and Hebraic Studies from Hebrew University in Jerusalem and completed 29 courses in depth psychology through the Jungian Institute and Saybrook University. He also holds a Certificate in Family History and Genealogy from BYU-Idaho. Now based in Utah, Dr. Lind continues to lecture globally and consult with dental manufacturers, researchers, and educators. He is actively seeking new opportunities in healthcare education, R&D, sales strategy, and behavioral consulting—where his unique blend of clinical experience, business acumen, and human-centered insight can contribute to industry innovation and patient care excellence.

certificates_and_programs.title: Family History and Genealogy Certificate
certificates_and_programs.description: Completed a rigorous academic certificate focused on research methods, genealogical record analysis, and digital archiving practices in family history.

certificates_and_programs.title: Hebrew Context of the Bible
certificates_and_programs.description: Completed courses in Biblical studies through a Hebraic lens, focusing on ancient Middle Eastern culture, language, and scriptural interpretation from original Hebrew texts.

certificates_and_programs.title: Biblical Hebrew Certificate
certificates_and_programs.description: Earned a certificate in Biblical Hebrew, gaining proficiency in reading, interpreting, and translating Old Testament scripture in its original form.

certificates_and_programs.title: Implantology Maxi Course
certificates_and_programs.description: Graduated from the AAID's Maxi Course in implantology. Training included advanced human anatomy, sinus augmentation, tissue and bone grafting, I.V. sedation, ACLS, and oral medicine.

certificates_and_programs.title: Center for Professional Development (CPD)
certificates_and_programs.description: Completed a two-year intensive program in dental practice management. Focus areas: budgeting, internal/external marketing, communication systems, business blueprinting, and case presentation.

certificates_and_programs.title: Kois Center Program Certificate
certificates_and_programs.description: Earned certification in the Kois Center curriculum focused on complex treatment planning, occlusion, biomechanics, restorative dentistry, periodontics, and implantology.

certificates_and_programs.title: Misch International Implant Institute
certificates_and_programs.description: Completed both Surgical and Prosthodontic curriculum tracks. Also participated in implant surgical training at Temple University and University of Detroit.

certificates_and_programs.title: Orognathic Bioesthetics International (O.B.I.)
certificates_and_programs.institution: University of Oregon Health Sciences Center
certificates_and_programs.description: Completed a four-year prosthodontic and rehabilitation program focusing on bioesthetic occlusion, restorative planning, and functional aesthetics.

certificates_and_programs.title: Pikos Implant Institute
certificates_and_programs.description: Received advanced training in soft and hard tissue grafting, sinus lifts, and 3D diagnostic case planning for complex implant surgeries.

certificates_and_programs.title: Dental Esthetics Program
certificates_and_programs.description: Completed a two-year program in cosmetic dentistry, including smile design, tooth morphology, and aesthetic restoration techniques.

certificates_and_programs.title: Center for Advanced Dental Education (C.A.D.E.)
certificates_and_programs.description: Hands-on surgical training in cosmetic periodontal surgery, connective tissue grafting, free gingival grafts, and use of Alloderm.

certificates_and_programs.title: Dental Organization of Conscious Sedation (DOCS)
certificates_and_programs.description: Advanced certification in conscious sedation. Training included pharmacology, patient assessment, medical emergency handling, and sedation protocols.

certificates_and_programs.title: Structural Consulting Certification Program (SCCP)
certificates_and_programs.description: Professional certification in business systems development and consulting, with emphasis on practice structure, performance metrics, and process improvement.

certificates_and_programs.title: Jungian/Clinical Psychology Program
certificates_and_programs.description: Completed 29 advanced graduate-level courses over three years. Focused on depth psychology, personality typologies, and therapeutic approaches aligned with Jungian clinical models.

certificates_and_programs.title: Cad/Cam Training Program
certificates_and_programs.instructors: Dr. James Klim, Jay Black, Frank Acosta
certificates_and_programs.description: Received in-depth training on full-mouth CAD/CAM restorations, anterior/posterior aesthetics, and Sirona InLab software for implant design.

certificates_and_programs.title: Laser Dentistry Certification
certificates_and_programs.description: Completed beginner to advanced training in diode and erbium laser applications for periodontal, surgical, and soft tissue procedures in general dentistry.

faculty_roles.title: Faculty Member / Visiting Faculty
institutions: UTech College of Oral Health Sciences (Kingston, Jamaica)
faculty_roles.notes: Served as a faculty member or visiting professor, delivering lectures and clinical training on topics including implantology, prosthodontics, and practice management.

faculty_roles.title: AAID Puerto Rico Maxi Course
faculty_roles.description: Delivered lectures and hands-on implantology training for postgraduate dental professionals.

activities: Taught implant surgery, tissue grafting, and prosthodontics
clinical_instructor.note: Institute relocated from Denver, CO to South Dakota in 2014

agd.master_tracks: Numerous programs throughout USA and Canada
agd.note: Recently resigned from the Colorado AGD Board

ada_success_program.scope: Lectured at all U.S. dental schools
ada_success_program.purpose: Helped prepare students for private practice and post-graduate transition

organizations: DARD – Denver Academy of Restorative Dentistry
